attributes.action: Reverse the decision to move from 3 to 4 weekly bin collections in Conwy Cty.
attributes.background: The decision to move from three weekly bin collections in Conwy County was rejected initially, however the decision has now been passed. This is despite great objection from opposing parties!

rejection.details:
This is a decision for your local council, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out how to petition the council here:

http://www.conwy.gov.uk/en/Council/Scrutiny/Petitions.aspx
